Create a unique world with its own mythology and magic system that is both fascinating and believable.
Develop complex and relatable characters that readers will care about and root for.
Use vivid descriptions and imagery to transport readers into your world and make them feel like they are right there alongside your characters.
Incorporate unexpected plot twists and turns that keep readers on the edge of their seats.

Finally, don't be afraid to take risks and try something new. Your readers may not expect what comes next, but if you trust your instincts and stay true to your vision, you just might create a truly original and unforgettable fantasy novel series.
